data.title: Talents
data.text:
Acky Bright

Artist

Acky Bright is a distinguished Japanese manga artist and illustrator, renowned for his work with McDonald‚Äôs, meta, DC Comics, Hasbro, and BMW. With his captivating kawakakkoii (cute and cool) characters and unique worldbuilding in manga-style, Acky's artistry stands out as truly exceptional.

After-school Bay Time

Music

We are an ACG band in SF Bay Area!

Ai Furihata

Voice Actor

Ai Furihata can be heard voicing characters such as Ruby Kurosawa (Love Live! Sunshine!!) and AiriMomoi (HATSUNE MIKU: COLORFUL STAGE!).

Aimai Mirai

Music

Aimai Mirai is bringing a KIRA KIRA LIVE ANIME SONG COVER BAND PERFORMANCE EXPLOSION to the Community Stage! Bring your light sticks and rock out with us!

AISHA

Music

R&B / POP singer-songwriter from Tokyo, Japan. Her song ‚ÄúSHY‚Äú has over 10,000,000 streams and 8 million views! She also sings the theme songs and jingles for ZUMBA, anime, games, movies, tv and commercials. You've probably heard her sing the theme song for Naruto, Guilty Gear and Yuri on ice!

AKARI ISHIKARI

Music

Akari Ishikari is a member of the VTuber group "Aogiri High School," which has been active since April 15, 2019, and follows the motto "If it's interesting, anything goes!"

Akari Kito

Voice Actor

Akari Kito is a Japanese Voice Actress whose notables include Nezuko Kamado from ‚ÄúDemon Slayer‚Äù, Kanata Konoe from ‚ÄúLove Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club‚Äù, Suzune Horikita from ‚ÄúClassroom of the Elite‚Äù, and Barbara from the game, ‚ÄúGenshin Impact‚Äù.

AKIBA SONIC

Music

Akibasonic is a three-member DJ unit that primarily plays anisong and EDM.

Akira Shimizu

Industry Appearance

President of A-1 Pictures Inc. and CloverWorks Inc.

Akume Nihmune

Industry Appearance

Vtuber Demon named Nihmune who creates variety content and music on Twitch, Youtube and music streaming platforms!

Albert Kao

Industry Appearance

Localization Producer of Fate/Grand Order English version

Alejandro Saab

Voice Actor

Alejandro Saab is a professional voice actor as well as content creator known as either KaggyFilms or CyYuVtuber. And from time to time will sing song covers under the name We.B

Allie Cat Cosplay

Cosplay Senpai

Allison of AllieCat Cosplay is a cosplayer and designer who started her journey in 2010, creating over 80 Cosplay Costumes, and earning Best in Show awards in several competitions for craftsmanship.

AmaLee

Voice Actor

AmaLee is a voice actor, singer, and streamer under her vtuber alias ‚ÄúMonarch‚Äù.

Aqu‚ô°rius Encore Project

Music

üåäüåû Aqu‚ô°rius is BACK with their Aqu‚ô°rius SUMMER SPLASH Live Tour! üé§ Take a break from the heat with a refreshing and energetic performance from Jpop kaigai idol group Aqu‚ô°rius Encore Project. Cheer on Aqu‚ô°rius as they take on Anime Expo 2024! üé∂

AriNico Cosplay

Cosplay Senpai

Ariel of AriNico Cosplay is an award-winning cosplayer with over 12 years of crafting experience. She specializes in sewing and is well-known for creating intricate cosplays that use needlework techniques such as embroidery and beadwork.

Arryn Zech

Voice Actor

Arryn Zech is an American actress, singer, and model best known for her roles as Blake Belladonna in the American anime, RWBY, and Dr. Emily Grey in the longest running web-based series, Red vs. Blue. You can also find her voice in anime such as Girl‚Äôs Frontline and The Detective is Already Dead, as well as in video games like Honkai: StarRail, SMITE, and PALADINS.

Asami Seto

Voice Actor

Voice Actor of Mina Ashiro in Kaiju No. 8. Born in Japan‚Äôs Saitama Prefecture, Asami Seto made her voice acting debut in 2011. She has earned acclaim for her performances as main characters in numerous hit works, including Chihayafuru, Tropical-Rouge! Pretty Cure, and Jujutsu Kaisen.

asid

Musician

asid is a DJ known for playing weeb tracks to unsuspecting normie crowds. Fortunately, you‚Äôre at Anime Expo so that won‚Äôt be a problem, right?

Astellium

Music

Astellium is a Japanese-inspired music group composed of vocalist Eririn, dj/producer Welksie, and songwriter/guitarist Kevin.

ASTERISM

Musician

ASTERISM is a three-piece instrumental heavy metal band consisting of HAL-CA (Gt.), MIYU (Ba.), and MIO (Dr.).

AVARIX

Music

Avarix is a DJ and Producer based in Los Angeles, California.

Ayako Kawasumi

Voice Actor

Voice Actor for Fate/Grand Order

Billy Tringali

Industry Appearance

Billy Tringali is the Founder and Editor of the ‚ÄòJournal of Anime and Manga Studies‚Äô (JAMS), an open-access, academic journal dedicated to the study of anime, manga, cosplay, and their fandoms.

Black Ros3

Musician

BLACKROS3 is a live rock band from Las Vegas performing fan-favorite music from anime and video games. More info at blackros3.com

BLOW Brass

Musician

BLOW Brass is a high energy brass band that plays for favorite anime openings!

BORO BORO

Fashion

At BORO BORO, vintage Japanese textiles are our passion. We carry a curated selection of vintage Japanese clothing as well as hand crafted goods made with upcycled kimono fabrics. We aim to create an accessible space for both kimono enthusiasts as well as those who are new to kimono to learn about the culture, history, and craftsmanship that goes into these incredible garments. Our vintage pieces have had many lives before reaching us, and hope that with your help they can continue to be loved and appreciated for many more generations to come.

Boy Hero

Music

Boy Hero is here to save you from mundane Post-Hardcore. Soaring melodies, visceral breakdowns, and emotive storytelling are just some of the elements that make up his sound.

Brandon McInnis

Host

Most known for voicing Gyutaro (the Upper Six demon) in Demon Slayer, Sir Nighteye in My Hero Academia, Mafuyu in Given, Alear in Fire Emblem: Engage, Finral Roulacase in Black Clover, Gen in Dr. Stone, Cell War in Mashle: Magic and Muscles, and Lawrence Bluewer in Black Butler: Public School Arc, Brandon McInnis is an LA-based voice actor, singer, and translator with over 160 roles in anime and video games, and a prolific TikTok account (>600k followers).

Brian Donovan

Voice Actor

Brian has been a professional actor (www.briandonovan.org) for more than 25 years in film, television and radio. He has worked on-screen with such luminaries as Jim Belushi, Jim Carrey and Angelina Jolie. He has been the voice of countless animated heroes, including Rock Lee from the juggernaut hit, Naruto.

Briana White

Voice Actor

Briana was born and raised in Orange County, California. She discovered her love for performing at seven years old and continued to perform and work backstage in the annual shows for many years. While in high school, she directed multiple one-acts starring her classmates and learned the fundamentals of crafting a story in the theater. Briana's acting then carried her to NYU, where she spent her first two years studying with the New Studio on Broadway, an acting-based studio with musical theater elements.

Brianna Knickerbocker

Voice Actor

Demon Slayer, Re:ZERO, Seven Deadly Sins, Genshin Impact, Fire Emblem Heroes, Catherine Full Body

Britt Baron

Voice Actor

Britt Baron the voice of Tifa Lockhart in the highly anticipated Final Fantasy Vii Rebirth has also lent her voice to a handful of other video games over the years including: Gabs in "Jedi: Survivor," Linda of the Blue Team in ‚ÄúHalo 5: Guardians,‚Äù ‚ÄúDestiny-2: Foresaken‚Äù as Ada-1, "Starfield," ‚ÄúDishonored 2,‚Äù "Fallout 76," "Agents of Mayhem," and ‚ÄúSkylanders: Imaginators‚Äù.

Brittany Lauda

Voice Actor

Brittany Lauda is a voice actor & ADR director best known for playing F.F./Foo Fighters in Jojo‚Äôs Bizarre Adventure: Stone Ocean, Tsuna in the Katekyo Hitman REBORN! Discotek Release, Yuzuriha in Dr. Stone, Riko in Made in Abyss, Kid Chi-Chi is Dragon Ball Z Kakarot, Satoko in Higurashi GOU/SOTSU, Saki in Girlfriend Girlfriend, Osakabehime and Liz in Fate/Grand Order, Ichigo in DARLING in the FRANXX, Mai in Nichijou, Cow Girl in Goblin Slayer, Lessar in A Certain Magical Index, Kenya in That Time I Got Reincarnated As A Slime, Doctor in Akudama Drive and Young Law in One Piece (to name a few out of hundreds!).

Bumvox

Music

Hailing from M√©xico, bumvox uses Game Boy and retro game consoles that she modified herself to produce pixelated melodies that give qualities of lofi trip-hop, techno/dance and 90s house music.

Caitlin Glass

Voice Actor

A voice actress and ADR director, best known for the role of Winry Rockbell in the FullmetalAlchemist franchise, Caitlin has been working in the anime industry since 2004. Caitlin was the ADR director for the English dub of the fan-favorite, Ouran High School Host Club, as well as the voice of Haruhi Fujioka.

Caleb Yen

Voice Actor

Caleb Yen is best known for his role as the Masc. Trailblazer, AKA Caelus, in the Hoyoverse game HONKAI STAR RAIL, as well as Minimalist and Windflit in ARKNIGHTS.

Cam Steady

Music

Cam Steady is a Los Angeles born independent artist who fuses the characters and themes of pop culture with new age hip hop.

Cat Protano

Voice Actor

Cat Protano is a voice actor, streamer, and lover of games and anime.

CelloKat

Musician

Get ready to be transported to a realm of epic melodies! Join CelloKat, the Cosplaying Cellist, as she rocks your world with popular anime and video game tunes! üéµüéª‚ú®

Chris Tergliafera

Voice Actor

Chris Tergliafera is an accomplished voice actor with a diverse portfolio in anime, video games, and animation. Originally working in TV Development at USA Network in Los Angeles, Chris decided to move off the executive path to follow his true passion in performing. After grinding for several years, he landed his first role as Sirius Oculus in ‚ÄúLittle Big Planet Karting" launching him into a successful career in voice acting.

ChromeSyndicate

Music

ChromeSyndicate is a SoCal based DJ that primarily specializes in high energy EDM, dubstep, and heavy bass music, while incorporating a variety of elements such as anime, kpop, emo, cyberpunk, memes, and video games.

Colin and Steve

Music

Colin and Steve's Lofi Living Room is a video game lo-fi band based in Los Angeles. Their music is influenced by Lo-Fi, trip hop and jazzy tunes, giving it a unique and relaxing vibe.

Cory Yee

Voice Actor

Cory Yee is a Chinese American voice actor, most well known for Gorou in Genshin Impact, Akito in Ghostwire: Tokyo and The Beholder in the award winning To Your Eternity.

Cowbutt Crunchies

Cosplay Judge

Regan of Cowbutt Crunchies Cosplay is one half of an internationally acclaimed LGBTQ+ couple who specializes in couture cosplay, education, and incredible pop culture design.

Cristina Vee

Voice Actor

Cristina Vee is a veteran voice actor from Los Angeles. She has over 550 credits to her name in animation, video games, commercials, and more. She also writes and performs music for various game titles and has 2 million subscribers across her social media platforms.

D.C. Douglas

Actor

You know this guy form over 300 projects! Highlights: Legion in "Mass Effect" trilogy, Rayvis in "Star Wars Jedi: Survivor," Kira in "Jojo's Bizarre Adventure," Pod 042 in "Nier Automata," Professor Kalego in "Welcome to Demon School, Iruma Kun," and, of course, Albert Wesker in 9 "Resident Evil" games.

Daiki Harashina

Industry Appearance

Monster Design for Frieren: Beyond Journey's End

Daiki Yamashita

Voice Actor

Daiki Yamashita made his voice acting debut in 2012. The following year, he starred as Rekka Shirogane in Gaist Crusher and Sakamichi Onoda in Yowamushi Pedal. He has voiced Izuku Midoriya in My Hero Academia since 2016.

Daman Mills

Voice Actor

Daman Mills is a voice actor and director. His best known voice credits include the Dragon Ball series (Frieza, Monaka), Final Fantasy VII Remake (Weiss the Immaculate), Honkai: Star Rail (Blade), SK8 the Infinity (Cherry Blossom), Shin Megami Tensei V (Aogami).

Dangle

Musician

Hi I'm Dangle! I'm a YouTuber that writes and sings English covers of popular anime opening and ending songs! I'll be performing a couple of my most popular covers live on stage!

David Erick Ramos

Musician

David Erick Ramos is a Los Angeles-based musician and ocarina virtuoso. Since 2007, his YouTube channel has garnered over 93 million views, featuring ocarina tutorials, original compositions, and covers. Inspired by ‚ÄúThe Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time,‚Äù David has been playing the ocarina since 2000 and continues to share his passion through performances, music education, and online content.

David Vincent

Voice Actor

David Vincent, the acclaimed voice actor hailing from Los Angeles, boasts a stellar career with standout roles such as Kento Nanami in Jujutsu Kaisen, Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez in Bleach, and Gilgamesh in Fate series. From Bungo Stray Dogs to Super Smash Bros., his versatility shines. Connect with his via social media @davidvincentva.

DEAR VANILLA

Fashion

AUTHENTIC JAPANESE KIMONOS AND RARITIES

Derek Stephen Prince

Voice Actor

Derek Stephen Prince is an actor and voice actor, known for his role as Uryu Ishida in BLEACH: Thousand-Year Blood War and as well as other roles.

DJ Carisma

Host

As an International Celebrity DJ and 3-time Female DJ of the Year, DJ Carisma brings unparalleled talent and energy to the stage.

dj-Jo & vally.exe

Music

Experience an Anime Lofi journey with dj-Jo live, complemented by vally.exe's enchanting vocals. Dive into a specially curated anime setlist with custom AMVs for a tranquil escape.

Doug Erholtz

Industry Appearance

With over 20 years in the voice over industry, Doug Erholtz has left his mark on many animated characters. Known for his work in anime as Inspector Zenigata in Lupin the III, TK from Digimon, Asuma Sarutobi from Naruto, Gin Ichimaru from Bleach, Akhiro Atland from Gundam: Iron Blooded Orphans and Jean Pierre Polnareff in Jojo's Bizarre Adventures - Stardust Crusaders.

Doujin Ronin

Music

Doujin Ronin is a Tennessee based Anison DJ bursting at the seems with intense energy and adrenaline. Resident DJ for Anison Hijack, Doujin has made a major splash in the Tennessee convention scene thanks to their signature high energy, stage presence, and mixing skills. Often times during a Doujin Ronin set, expect to hear cursed meme worthy original mash ups coupled with bombastic remixes of EDM tracks with anime samples spanning a multitude of different genres. Doujin lives and breathes for putting on unforgettable shows and is beyond excited to be DJ'ing for AX dance this year!

Elira Pendora

Music

A sky dragon who came from the heavens closest to the sun. She has the kindness and receptiveness that makes the light of a sunny day fall equally on all.

Erica Lindbeck

Voice Actor

Erica Lindbeck is an actress residing in Los Angeles. She is known for her work in the voiceover industry, & is honored to have worked on a large & diverse portfolio of projects, including Futaba Sakura in Persona 5, Jessie in the Final Fantasy 7 Remake, Peppermint in Hi-Fi Rush, Daki in Demon Slayer, Lady Nagant in My Hero Academia, Loona in Helluva Boss, Emira Blight in The Owl House, & Black Cat in Spiderman PS4 to name a few. For news & announcements, find Erica on Twitter & Instagram.

Eririn

Music

Based out of Los Angeles, California, Eririn is a Japanese-American vocalist who specializes in singing in both Japanese and English!

Etorouji Shiono

Guest of Honor

In 2004, he began serializing "√úbel Blatt" in Gangan YG. The series later moved to Young Gangan and Monthly Big Gangan, concluding in 2019. The collected volumes, from Volume 0 to Volume 23 (completed), have sold approximately 3.5 million copies worldwide.

Evan Minto

Industry Appearance

Co-Founder and Licensing/Marketing Director of manga app and publisher Azuki, anime/manga critic, podcaster, and frequent convention panelist.

Faye Mata

Voice Actor

Faye Mata has voiced over 100 credited characters in video games and animated series (Pokemon, Genshin Impact, Honkai Star Rail, Hunter x Hunter, Sailor Moon, Sword Art Online, Hazbin Hotel, Helluva Boss, Tekken, Barbie, Lego, JoJo‚Äôs Bizarre Adventure, DC‚Äôs Deathstroke etc), streamer, and former competitive gamer! She's known for roles like the Goddess Aqua (Konosuba), Astolfo (Fate), Kagami (Miraculous Ladybug), Glitz & Glam (Helluva Boss), Lulu (League of Legends), A.K.I. in Street Fighter, Petra (Fire Emblem), and many more! Come meet her at the convention, and follow her socials @FayeMata!

Finana Ryugu

Music

A mermaid spending time with tropical fish in the sea of coral reefs. Has a heart as clear and pure as the calm and beautiful sea.

Flipboitamidles

Music

Flipboitamidles is a seasoned mashup artist, having done mashups for the past decade. His mashups have been played around the world such as in Japan, Australia, and the UK. His mashups has also been noticed from some notable musicians such as Ellie Goulding, The Weekend, and Skrillex. Although his style of mashups are simple, his execution of his ideas is how he has a gained a following in the mashup scene.

Fuga Yamashiro

Industry Appearance

Joined Science SARU in 2016. Starting work as a production assistant, he moved up to working as unit director on Inu-Oh and as an episode director on The Heike Story. He also served as assistant director on Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken! and Tatami Time Machine Blues. He is making his directorial debut with the TV anime series DAN DA DAN, set to air in October 2024.

Fukuro

Musician

Fukuro is a visual rock band from Tokyo, Japan.

Gavin Hignight

Industry Appearance

Gavin Hignight is a television writer and producer his other credits include Tekken: Bloodline, Transformers: War For Cybertron, Star Wars: Resistance, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2012) and more.

Gearous

Artist

They're famous for drawing illustration for Modaozushi Japanese audio drama series with MiMi. They've collaborated on exclusive illustrations for Tian Guan Ci Fu with Bilibili. They also create captivating illustrations and contribute to games like FGO, NetEase and most recently 'Velvet react'. Their art mostly features male characters, aiming to connect with anime and donghua fans.

GEEGA

Industry Appearance

VShojo‚Äôs GEEGA, an optional MidBoss from ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà, finds it easy to create content and blend in with VTubers as a 2-dimensional woman herself.

George Wada

Industry Appearance

Born in Hyogo Prefecture in September 1978. After working for network solutions corporation Cisco Systems, he joined Production I.G in 2005. He went independent in 2012, founding WIT STUDIO as president and CEO. At WIT STUDIO, he was involved in hit titles such as "Attack on Titan (Seasons 1-3)," "SPY√óFAMILY," "Ranking of Kings," "Bubble" and more. Starting in August 2022, he was also appointed president and CEO of Production I.G.

Gigguk

Digital Influencer

YouTuber/Streamer. Gigguk is one of the pioneers of anime YouTube, respected by many overseas anime fans.

Griffin Burns

Voice Actor

Griffin Burns is an LA-based voice actor & musician most known for his work as Tartaglia (‚ÄúChilde‚Äù) in Genshin Impact, Muichiro in Demon Slayer, Doppio in Jojo‚Äôs Bizarre Adventure.

H.Naoto

Fashion

Naoto Hirooka, a creative designer of h.NAOTO was born in Kobe in 1997. In 1999 and debuted h.NAOTO brand in 2000. He has created his original fashion images involving Japanese culture such as Gothic and Lolita, Visual-kei. also design stage costumes for musicians and work as a lecturer at a fashion school.

Ham Sandwich

Musician

Ham Sandwich is a multi-genre rapper, singer, writer, and producer from the greater St. Louis area who primarily makes hip hop music inspired by anime, manga, and video games.

Hamu Cotton

Music

Hamu Cotton is a Japanese cosplay performer and YouTuber based in the SoCal area.

Haruka Karibu

Industry Appearance

VShojo‚Äôs Haruka Karibu loves collabing with friends, bringing cozy and chaotic together for her fun streams!

HASU NO SORA JOGAKUIN SCHOOL IDOL CLUB

Music

Virtual, yet Real. A high school drama capturing the "now" with the girls starting this new school year!

HDC

Cosplay Judge

Award-winning master craftsman Tim Harrison formally founded Harrison Designs and Concepts, or HDC, in 2018 to break traditional design and fabrication standards to make fantasy reality and the impossible possible. They specialize in crafting cinematic and hyper-realistic details in multi-medium props, costumes, and practical effects. They share their passion for the craft via panels, tutorials, and an adjunct professorship with DePaul University in Chicago.

Henya the Genius

Industry Appearance

Henya the Genius is a VTuber from VShojo with an IQ of 999, known for her energetic personality, love for gaming, cats, & sweets.

Hime Hajime

Industry Appearance

VShojo‚Äôs Hime Hajime is exploring Earth's entertainment, often enjoying video games and drinks while captivating fans with her humor.

HIMEHINA

Music

HIMEHINA, a virtual artist duo consisting of Hime Tanaka and Hina Suzuki. Hime shouts emotions through songs with a powerful high-pitched voice, while Hina uses her gentle voice performing soft harmonies to Hime's powerful vocals.

Hiroki Nanami

Guest of Honor

Former Takarazuka Revue ‚ÄúOtokoyaku‚Äù (male role) star. Member of the Takarazuka Revue from 2003 to 2019. She was selected to play the lead role in the ‚ÄúShinjin Koen‚Äù known as New Talent performance (a performance by newer member of the troupe) and was active as a male actor star. She played the heroine in timeless classics as Scarlet in ‚ÄúGone with the Wind‚Äù and Oscar in ‚ÄúThe Rose of Versailles.‚Äù

Hiroko Tokumine

Fashion

This year, at Paris Fashion Week 2024FW, Hiroko Tokumine has presented a new kimono fashion that anyone can wear in no time, combining Lolita fashion with kimono. It features Hiroko Tokumine's original sleeves "Japonica Sleeves", which combines kimono and western clothing elements.

Hiroshi Kamei

Industry Appearance

Producer. Works as an anime producer at Mainichi Broadcasting System, Inc. He has been engaged in producing around 10 titles a year.

Howard Wang

Voice Actor

Howard Wang is an actor known for voicing characters like Xie Lian in Heaven Official‚Äôs Blessing, Langa in SK8 the Infinity, Luka in Honkai: Star Rail, and many more!

Indu Vasudev

Industry Appearance

Indu S. Vasudev was a Recording Engineer and currently a Producer/Production Manager at Iyuno USA. She‚Äôs worked on over 100 live action and animation titles including Beastars, Record of Ragnarok, Kengan Ashura, Violet Evergarden, and Devilman/Crybaby.

Ironmouse

Industry Appearance

VShojo‚Äôs Ironmouse is a charismatic Demon Queen from Hell with impressive vocal range and musical talent, known for her playful personality.

Isekai Stage

Musician

Isekai Stage is a group of LA musicians who banded together for their love of anime and contemporary Japanese culture. Consisting of Sashank Venkatesh (Vox.), Xabier Uria (Gt.) and R3M (Dr.), each member contributes their unique talents and outstanding musicianship to bring faithful renditions of your favorite songs in anime and video games to the live stage.

j-Bit

Music

j-Bit is a instrumental music group from Los Angeles who are passionate about anime and J-music. Embark on a musical journey featuring our original arrangements of many of your favorite anime themes!

Jackie Lastra

Voice Actor

Come meet Jackie Lastra, voice of Xiangling (Genshin Impact), Fuuko (Undead Unluck), Melty (Rising of the Shield Hero), Kiyo (Demon Slayer), Serena (Pokemon Masters), and many more!

Jase Cloud

Musician

Multi-format music producer and DJ.

Jay Andrade Quartet

Musician

Jay Andrade is a music educator, performer, and composer in Bakersfield, California. He has been an active member of the California music scene for over 17 years.

John Aoshima

Industry Appearance

John Aoshima, is an Emmy and Annies nominated Director known for Disney‚Äôs critically acclaimed hit series, Gravity Falls and Fox‚Äôs long running Primetime series, American Dad!

Juliana Chahayed

Music

Juliana Chahayed is a 27-year-old singer and songwriter based in Los Angeles.

Juliet Simmons

Voice Actor

Juliet Simmons is a voice actress and popular YouTube cover artist with over 10 years of experience in both arenas. Singing anime and Vocaloid covers under the name JubyPhonic, she currently has 1.15 million subscribers and 100+ covers that have broken 1 million views on YouTube.

Jun

Artist

Jun is a veteran h-manga artist of over a decade, creating your favorite monster girls!

Junya Enoki

Voice Actor

His most renowned anime performances include Yuji Itadori of JUJUTSU KAISEN, DaigoToake of Firefighter Daigo: Rescuer in Orange, Seishu Inui of Tokyo Revengers, Nasa Yuzaki of TONIKAWA: Over the Moon For You, Pannacotta Fugo of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind, and Horikawa Kunihiro of Touken Ranbu. His movie performances also include Jona Bashta of Mobile Suit Gundam Narrative, and Senjuro Rengoku of Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mugen Train Arc.

Just Cosplay Sings

Musician

Just Cosplay (JC) Sings is an Australian cosplayer and musician. She is the winner of Cyberpunk 2077‚Äôs GrowlFM international music contest (original song ‚ÄúAfterlife‚Äù) which has been streamed over 1 Million times on Spotify. Her viral cover of ‚ÄúThe Amazing Digital Circus 1995‚Äù has been played and remixed over 100 Million times on Youtube. She has also sang for Cartoon Network (‚ÄúCraig of the Creek‚Äù) and Bluepoch Games (Reverse:1999 ‚ÄúJessica EP‚Äù).

Justin Leach

Industry Appearance

Cubic Pictures CEO

Kaho Shibuya

Industry Appearance

Kaho Shibuya: Content Creator, Anison DJ, Singer, and Published Author.

Kanae

A man with a soothing personality who appeared out of nowhere like an angel. The truth as to what he does every day remains a mystery.

KANOU YOSHIKI

Industry Appearance

Part 2 Director for Fate/Grand Order

Kat Padlan

Musician

Kat Padlan is a singer-songwriter known for blending jazz, Neo-soul, R&B, and funk into one irresistible melody. Kat weaves together soulful melodies and anime songs, creating experience that will leave you wanting more. She is known for her unique voice and twist on popular songs, including her own original music.

Katsuhiro Takei

Industry Appearance

Producer at Toho

Katsura Hashino

Guest of Honor

Katsura Hashino is a game director and producer working at ATLUS responsible fornotable titles including "Persona 3,4,5", ‚ÄúShin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne‚Äù and"Catherine". After launching his own production unit "Studio Zero" within ATLUS, he is presently immersed in the development of a highly anticipated new JRPG "Metaphor: ReFantazio".

Kayli Mills

Voice Actor

Kayli is a Michigan born voice actor, singer, lyricist and script adapter. You may know them as Keqing (Genshin Impact), Alice (Sword Art Online), Emilia (Re:Zero), Clara (Welcome to Demon School, Iruma-kun) and many more!

Kazuki Ura

Voice Actor

Kazuki Ura is a Japanese voice actor who is the voice of various characters such as Yoichi Isagi in "BLUE LOCK", Shiki Ichinose in "TOUGEN ANKI", Subaru Makabe and Baccherus in "Shadowverse Flame", and Shota Doi in "World's End Harem".

Keiichiro Saito

Industry Appearance

Director for Frieren: Beyond Journey's End and BOCCHI THE ROCK!

Keisuke Seshimo

Industry Appearance

Animation Producer for JUJUTSU KAISEN

Keith Silverstein

Voice Actor

Keith Silverstein, esteemed voice actor of Zhongli in Genshin Impact, Torbj√∂rn in Overwatch 2, and Hisoka in Hunter x Hunter, boasts an extensive resume will be appearing at Anime Expo 2024.

Kellen Goff

Voice Actor

Notable roles include Funtime Freddy, Glamrock Freddy, Sun, and Moon in Five Nights at Freddy‚Äôs (as well as Foxy in the Five Nights at Freddy‚Äôs movie), Kai Chisaki / Overhaul in My Hero Academia, Fiddlesticks in League of Legends, Diavolo in Jojo‚Äôs Bizarre Adventure, Sasaki in Sasaki and Miyano, and Porco Galliard in Attack on Titan.

Ken Ayugai

Host

Active player widely recognized in the Japanese entertainment industry as Musician, Actor, Radio DJ, TV personality, Emcee, etc.

Ken Harada

Music

KEN HARADA is a DJ/Producer originally from Japan, now based in LA.

Kenta Miyake

Voice Actor

Michelle K. Sugihara is the Executive Director of CAPE (Coalition of Asian Pacifics in Entertainment), the premier non-profit organization creating opportunities and driving change for Asian and Pacific Islander (API) success in Hollywood. She is a fourth generation Japanese American born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii. She graduated with honors from Claremont McKenna College with a dual major in Economics and Psychology and a minor in Asian American Studies, followed by a law degree from UCLA. Prior to joining CAPE, she was an entertainment attorney, film producer, and adjunct professor for the Claremont Colleges‚Äô Intercollegiate Department of Asian American Studies.
